data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_b1bdf46136cb8a7903dae6d58e8349cb.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Upon death, Diggie reverses time and turns back to egg form, in which he can continue to move around and gains a new set of skills. He cannot be targeted in egg form and will revive after a period of time.

Diggie flings an owl alarm to the target location that remains stationary for 25s or until it reacts to the first enemy in range, chasing them and exploding upon collision. The explosion deals 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slows them by 30%.

Diggie gains 2 stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Dangerous Sparks</font> each time an enemy hero is hit by the explosion (up to 60 stacks), each stack increasing the skill's damage by 1%. He loses half the stacks upon death, but can gain 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Dangerous Sparks</font> each time his skill hits an enemy hero when in egg form.

Up to 5 owl alarms can exist at the same time.

Diggie marks the target enemy hero for 4s and pulls them back to their previous location after the duration ends, dealing 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and briefly slowing them by 80%.

If the enemy moves out of the circle, the pull will be triggered early.

Diggie removes all debuffs on nearby allied heroes (including himself) and grants them a 650<font color="62f8fe"> (+300% Total Magic Power)</font> shield and Control Immunity for 2s. He also gains 50% Movement Speed for 0.5s.

data.name: Diggie

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Ambush enemies with high burst damage.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+12% Healing Effect
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+6% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by <%Num1> for <Num2>s.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Dire Hit: The next attack against enemy heroes below 35% HP deals 7-18% of their Max HP as extra Hybrid Damage (half Magic and half Physical).
equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Dire Hit: The next attack against enemy heroes below 35% HP deals 7-18% of their Max HP as extra Hybrid Damage (half Magic and half Physical).
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

recommendmasterplan.name: Fire Flux Esports APEX47
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The owl scholar who can control time.

assist.desc: Diggie works best with Marksmen that lack mobility or survivability like Layla and Miya because his skills can protect them very well.

strong.desc: Diggie counters close range, CC focused heroes like Atlas and Lolita since he can pull them away and remove their CCs with his Ultimate.

weak.desc: Diggie is countered by agile and bursty Assassins like Ling and Aamon because his own lack of defense makes him an easy target.
